title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a look at Matthew Stafford's career as he prepares to play in the Super Bowl and why he could surpass Aaron Rodgers as one of the all time great quarterbacks if he's able to bring home the Lombardi Trophy. He discusses the Nets as their losing streak continues and why Brooklyn targeted the wrong super stars by going all in on Kyrie Irving, Kevin Durant and James Harden. He tells you why he was right about Russell Westbrook and wrong about Tom Brady. Plus, Hall of Famer and Fox Sports NFL analyst Jimmy Johnson joins the show to talk about preparing for the Super Bowl and the type of pressure you face playing in the big game. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
